law.text: Any person who operates as a U-Drive-It and rents vehicles for less than sixty (60) days shall obtain a U-Drive-It certificate prior to beginning operations. Any person who operates as a U-Drive-It and rents or leases vehicles for sixty (60) days or more may obtain a U-Drive-It certificate
law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 19, sec. 9, effective June 24, 2015. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 195, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 466, sec. 8, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 10. -- Created 1956 (2nd Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 7, sec. 14.
